38 //
39 // Defines the AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D class, which inherits
40 // from the ValueFunction base class. This class assumes Kinematic planner
41 // dynamics and QuadrotorDecoupled6D tracker dynamics, and uses a Box tracking
42 // error bound.
43 //
45 
46 #include <fastrack/value/analytical_kinematic_box_quadrotor_decoupled_6d.h>
47 
48 namespace fastrack {
49 namespace value {
50 
51 // Initialize from a ROS NodeHandle.
52 bool AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D::
53 Initialize(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
54  name_ = ros::names::append(
55  n.getNamespace(), "AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D");
56 
57  if (!LoadParameters(n)) {
58  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to load parameters.", name_.c_str());
59  return false;
60  }
61 
62  if (!RegisterCallbacks(n)) {
63  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to register callbacks.", name_.c_str());
64  return false;
65  }
66 
67  initialized_ = true;
68  return true;
69 }
70 
71 // Load parameters.
72 bool AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D::
73 LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
74  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
75 
76  // Set dynamics parameters.
77  QuadrotorControl qc_lower, qc_upper;
78  qc_lower.yaw_rate = 0.0;
79  qc_upper.yaw_rate = 0.0;
80 
81  if (!nl.getParam("tracker/upper/pitch", qc_upper.pitch)) return false;
82  if (!nl.getParam("tracker/upper/roll", qc_upper.roll)) return false;
83  if (!nl.getParam("tracker/upper/thrust", qc_upper.thrust)) return false;
84  if (!nl.getParam("tracker/lower/thrust", qc_lower.thrust)) return false;
85  qc_lower.pitch = -qc_upper.pitch;
86  qc_lower.roll = -qc_lower.roll;
87 
88  tracker_dynamics_.Initialize(qc_lower, qc_upper);
89 
90  VectorXd max_planner_speed(3);
91  if (!nl.getParam("planner/vx", max_planner_speed(0))) return false;
92  if (!nl.getParam("planner/vy", max_planner_speed(1))) return false;
93  if (!nl.getParam("planner/vz", max_planner_speed(2))) return false;
94  planner_dynamics_.Initialize(-max_planner_speed, max_planner_speed);
95 
96  // Compute maximum acceleration. Make sure all elements are positive.
97  max_acc_ = tracker_dynamics_.Evaluate(
98  PositionVelocity(Vector3d::Zero(), Vector3d::Zero()), qc_upper).Velocity();
99  max_acc_(0) = std::abs(max_acc_(0));
100  max_acc_(1) = std::abs(max_acc_(1));
101  max_acc_(2) = std::abs(max_acc_(2));
102 
103  // Velocity/acceleration disturbance bounds.
104  if (!nl.getParam("disturbance/velocity/x", vel_dist_(0))) return false;
105  if (!nl.getParam("disturbance/velocity/y", vel_dist_(1))) return false;
106  if (!nl.getParam("disturbance/velocity/z", vel_dist_(2))) return false;
107  if (!nl.getParam("disturbance/acceleration/x", acc_dist_(0))) return false;
108  if (!nl.getParam("disturbance/acceleration/y", acc_dist_(1))) return false;
109  if (!nl.getParam("disturbance/acceleration/z", acc_dist_(2))) return false;
110 
111  // Position/velocity expansion.
112  if (!nl.getParam("expansion/velocity/x", vel_exp_(0))) return false;
113  if (!nl.getParam("expansion/velocity/y", vel_exp_(1))) return false;
114  if (!nl.getParam("expansion/velocity/z", vel_exp_(2))) return false;
115  pos_exp_ = vel_exp_.cwiseProduct(2.0 * max_planner_speed + 0.5 * vel_exp_).
116  cwiseQuotient(max_acc_ - acc_dist_);
117 
118  // Generate the tracking error bound.
119  bound_.x = pos_exp_(0) + (max_planner_speed(0) + vel_dist_(0)) *
120  (max_planner_speed(0) + vel_dist_(0)) / (max_acc_(0) - acc_dist_(0));
121  bound_.y = pos_exp_(1) + (max_planner_speed(1) + vel_dist_(1)) *
122  (max_planner_speed(1) + vel_dist_(1)) / (max_acc_(1) - acc_dist_(1));
123  bound_.z = pos_exp_(2) + (max_planner_speed(2) + vel_dist_(2)) *
124  (max_planner_speed(2) + vel_dist_(2)) / (max_acc_(2) - acc_dist_(2));
125 
126  return true;
127 }
128 
129 // Register callbacks.
130 bool AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D::
131 RegisterCallbacks(const ros::NodeHandle& n) { return true; }
132 
133 // Evaluate the value function at tracker/planner states.
134 double AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D::
135 Value(const PositionVelocity& tracker_x,
136  const PositionVelocity& planner_x) const {
137  // Get relative state.
138  const PositionVelocity relative_x =
139  tracker_x.RelativeTo<PositionVelocity>(planner_x);
140 
141  // Value is the maximum of values in each 2D subsystem.
142  double value = -std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
143  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < 3; ii++) {
144  const double x = relative_x.Position()(ii);
145  const double v = relative_x.Velocity()(ii);
146  const double v_p = planner_dynamics_.MaxControl()(ii);
147 
148  // Value surface A: + for x "below" convex acceleration parabola.
149  const double value_A = -x - pos_exp_(ii) +
150  (0.5 * (v - v_p)*(v - v_p) - v_p*v_p) / (max_acc_(ii) - acc_dist_(ii));
151 
152  // Value surface B: + for x "above" concave braking parabola.
153  const double value_B = x + pos_exp_(ii) -
154  (-0.5 * (v + v_p)*(v + v_p) + v_p*v_p) / (max_acc_(ii) - acc_dist_(ii));
155 
156  // Value function is the maximum of the above two surfaces.
157  value = std::max(value, std::max(value_A, value_B));
158  }
159 
160  return value;
161 }
162 
163 // Compute the value function gradient at a pair of tracker/planner states.
164 PositionVelocity AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D::
165 Gradient(const PositionVelocity& tracker_x,
166  const PositionVelocity& planner_x) const {
167  // Get relative state.
168  const PositionVelocity relative_x =
169  tracker_x.RelativeTo<PositionVelocity>(planner_x);
170 
171  // Loop through each subsystem and populate grad in position/velocity dims.
172  Vector3d pos_grad, vel_grad;
173  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < 3; ii++) {
174  const double x = relative_x.Position()(ii);
175  const double v = relative_x.Velocity()(ii);
176  const double v_p = planner_dynamics_.MaxControl()(ii);
177 
178  // Value surface A: + for x "below" convex acceleration parabola.
179  const double value_A = -x - pos_exp_(ii) +
180  (0.5 * (v - v_p)*(v - v_p) - v_p*v_p) / (max_acc_(ii) - acc_dist_(ii));
181 
182  // Value surface B: + for x "above" concave braking parabola.
183  const double value_B = x + pos_exp_(ii) -
184  (-0.5 * (v + v_p)*(v + v_p) + v_p*v_p) / (max_acc_(ii) - acc_dist_(ii));
185 
186  // Check which side we're on. If on A side, grad points toward -pos,
187  // if on B side, grad points toward +pos.
188  if (value_A > value_B) {
189  pos_grad(ii) = -1.0;
190  vel_grad(ii) = (v - v_p) / (max_acc_(ii) - acc_dist_(ii));
191  } else {
192  pos_grad(ii) = 1.0;
193  vel_grad(ii) = (v + v_p) / (max_acc_(ii) - acc_dist_(ii));
194  }
195  }
196 
197  return PositionVelocity(pos_grad, vel_grad);
198 }
199 
200 // Priority of the optimal control at the given vehicle and planner states.
201 // This is a number between 0 and 1, where 1 means the final control signal
202 // should be exactly the optimal control signal computed by this
203 // value function.
204 double AnalyticalKinematicBoxQuadrotorDecoupled6D::
205 Priority(const PositionVelocity& tracker_x,
206  const PositionVelocity& planner_x) const {
207  // Get value at this relative state.
208  const double value = Value(tracker_x, planner_x);
209 
210  // HACK! The threshold should probably be externally set via config.
211  const double relative_high = 0.20; // 20% of max inside value
212  const double relative_low = 0.05; // 5% of max inside value
213 
214  // TODO! Make sure this is actually the maximum value.
215  const double max_value = std::max(bound_.x, std::max(bound_.y, bound_.z));
216  const double value_high = relative_high * max_value;
217  const double value_low = relative_low * max_value;
218 
219  const double priority =
220  1.0 - std::max(0.0, std::min((value-value_low) / (value_high-value_low), 1.0));
221 
222  return priority;
223 }
